javadoc:
Static methods to delete records from a table. Handles subtle issues with image base causing
 address to "wrap".

methods.name: deleteRecords
methods.comment:
Deletes the records the fall within the given range. Uses the address map to convert the
 address range into 1 or more key ranges. (Address ranges may not be continuous after
 converting to long space).
 NOTE: Absolute key encodings are not handled currently !!

params.name: table
params.comment: the database table to delete records from.

params.name: addrMap
params.comment: the address map used to convert addresses into long keys.

params.name: start
params.comment: the start address in the range.

params.name: end
params.comment: the end address in the range.

throws.comment: if a database io error occurs.

methods.name: deleteRecords
methods.comment:
Deletes the records that have indexed address fields that fall within the given range.
 Uses the address map to convert the
 address range into 1 or more key ranges. (Address ranges may not be continuous after
 converting to long space).
 NOTE: Absolute key encodings are not handled currently !!

params.name: table
params.comment: the database table to delete records from.

params.name: colIx
params.comment: the column that has indexed addresses.

params.name: addrMap
params.comment: the address map used to convert addresses into long keys.

params.name: start
params.comment: the start address in the range.

params.name: end
params.comment: the end address in the range.

throws.comment: if a database io error occurs.

name: AddressRecordDeleter
comment:
Static methods to delete records from a table. Handles subtle issues with image base causing
 address to "wrap".
